question: In which part of the Iberian Peninsula is Teruel, Spain situated?
asked_question_translated: I hvilken del av Den iberiske halvøy ligger Teruel i Spania?
answer: Teruel ligger i den nordøstlige delen av Den iberiske halvøy i Spania.
answer_translated_eng: Teruel is located in the north-eastern part of the Iberian Peninsula in Spain.
